title: How are hate, envy, and jealousy connected? - Quora

response.answer_text: Envy and jealousy are synonyms, so the connection is between those two, and hate! When envy and jealousy remain unresolved, they devolve into hate. Hate is a far more virulent emotion than envy /jealousy!
Jealousy is envy, and what begins in jealousy surfaces as hate, toxic hatred. Nobody puts their hand up to acute jealousy, first there is the denial, then the hatred.
